name: .NVT3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .NVT3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can play an NVT3 file with NetVue's NVT Player, available for Windows and macOS. For example, to open an NVT3 file, click Select a NVT file, then navigate to and open your NVT3 file.
You can use Netvue's NVT3 Converter (Windows) to convert NVT3 videos to .MP4 videos.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
